activities: Aryzta receives information from and pertaining to its European employees. The information is obtained via electronic, paper or verbal format.  Aryzta only seeks Safe Harbor protection with respect to human resources information that is transferred from the EEA or Switzerland to the U.S. We will be using the information for Talent in the future:  education, mobility, prior work experience, skills & capabilities.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, France, Germany, Ireland, Poland, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Employee information, such as name, contact details, c.v. and other employment-related information
privacyprograms: A self-regulatory privacy program for human resources information that adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles.
